paper_title: Quiver DT Invariants and Log Gromov--Witten Theory of Toric Varieties
abstract: We review how log Gromov--Witten invariants of toric varieties can be used to express quiver Donaldson--Thomas invariants in terms of the simpler attractor Donaldson--Thomas invariants. This is an exposition of joint work with Pierrick Bousseau.
publication_venue: 15 pages, 9 figures. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:2004.05124
